attributes.long-description:
Download and play the multiple Game of the Year award-winner Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2. Experience gripping and heart-racing action as you face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse. Modern Warfare 2 picks up immediately following the historic events of Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare™, the blockbuster title that earned worldwide critical acclaim.

© 2009-2011 Activision Publishing, Inc. Activision, Call of Duty and Modern Warfare are registered trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. This product contains software technology licensed from Id Software ("Id Technology"). Id Technology © 1999-2011 Id Software, Inc. Dolby and the double-D symbol are trademarks of Dolby Laboratories.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
attributes.name: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2
